articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: NASA just lost contact with a Mars orbiter, and will soon lose another one - Ars Technica
articles.description: If NASA is serious about exploring Mars, it’s past time to send new missions.

articles.title: Dark Chocolate Compound Linked To Slower Aging - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A compound naturally found in dark chocolate may slow key signs of aging in the body.
articles.content: A compound naturally found in dark chocolate may slow key signs of aging in the body. Researchers discovered that people with higher levels of theobromine often look biologically younger on a molecul… [+4624 chars]

articles.title: Google’s first AI glasses expected next year - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is working on various types of AI-powered glasses — one model is designed for screen-free assistance, using built-in speakers, microphones, and cameras to allow the user to communicate with Gemini and take photos. The other model has an in-lens display…
articles.content:
Google will launch its first AI glasses in 2026, according to a company blog post.
